sqls.sql: SELECT da_act_id, worker_id, da_act_worker_rmk01, da_act_worker_rmk02, da_act_worker_rmk03, da_act_worker_rmk04, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_user, upd_host FROM me_da_act_worker WHERE da_act_id = @da_act_id OR rid = @rid;
DELETE FROM me_da_act_worker WHERE da_act_id = @da_act_id OR rid = @rid;
